selected_quotes: Wavelets pioneer wins top maths prize for theory that has applications from digital cinema to gravitational waves
Wavelet pioneer wins this year's #AbelPrize - a theory that helped LIGO to detect gravitational waves
'Wavelet revolution' pioneer scoops top maths award
‘Wavelet revolution’ pioneer wins Abel Prize - hailed as the Nobel prize of mathematics
Congrats Yves Meyer, Abel Prize winner pioneer of wavelets - uses of which include pinpointing #gravitationalwaves

news.title: Gravitational Waves Push Supermassive Black Hole Out Of Its Host Galaxy
news.summary: Black holes are known to have such mass that it’s impossible for any light to escape through them.

news.title: Yves Meyer: 'Mathematik-Nobelpreis' für die 'Wavelet-Revolution'
news.summary: Die Norwegische Akademie der Wissenschaften hat den diesjährigen Preisträger des Abelpreises benannt.

news.title: Yves Meyer: 'Mathematik-Nobelpreis' für die 'Wavelet-Revolution'
news.summary: News | 21.03.2017 | Drucken | Teilen Yves Meyer: 'Mathematik-Nobelpreis' für die 'Wavelet-Revolution' Von der Gravitationswellenforschung bis hin zur Datenkompression - das mathematische Analysewerkzeug des Franzosen Yves Meyer hat Forschung und…

news.title: Wavelet Theory Nets Top Mathematics Award
news.summary: French mathematician Yves Meyer has won the 2017 Abel Prize for his “pivotal role” in establishing the theory of wavelets — data-analysis tools used in everything from pinpointing gravitational waves to compressing digital films.

news.title: Από το JPG μέχρι το Διάστημα
news.summary: Όσλο Το φετινό βραβείο «Άμπελ», το οποίο θεωρείται το «Νόμπελ των Μαθηματικών», απονέμεται στον γάλλο μαθηματικό Ιβ Μεγιέ (Yves Meyer) για την καθοριστική συμβολή του στη «θεωρία των κυματίων» -ένα μαθηματικό εργαλείο με ευρείες εφαρμογές, από τη συμπ…

news.title: Il premio Abel al creatore della teoria matematica delle ondine - Le Scienze
news.summary: Considerato una sorta di Nobel per la matematica, quest'anno il premio è stato attribuito al francese Yves Meyer per la sua formulazione della “teoria delle ondine”, che ha trovato una miriade di applicazioni, dalla compressione dei dati nel cinema…

facebook.title: Nature
facebook.summary: French mathematician Yves Meyer has won the 2017 Abel Prize for his “pivotal role” in establishing the theory of wavelets - data-analysis tools used in everything from pinpointing gravitational waves to compressing digital films.
